criteria: Identifies the causes of eating disorders
Identifies the symptoms of eating disorders
Explains the harmful effects of eating disorders
Understanding of the complexities and co-occurring factors
descriptions: Does not identify any causes of eating disorders or provides inaccurate information.
Identifies only one cause of eating disorders with limited accuracy.
Identifies some causes of eating disorders with some accuracy.
Identifies several causes of eating disorders with reasonable accuracy.
Identifies most of the significant causes of eating disorders with high accuracy.
Identifies all the significant causes of eating disorders comprehensively and accurately, demonstrating a deep understanding.
Does not identify any symptoms of eating disorders or provides inaccurate information.
Identifies only one symptom of eating disorders with limited accuracy.
Identifies some symptoms of eating disorders with some accuracy.
Identifies several symptoms of eating disorders with reasonable accuracy.
Identifies most of the significant symptoms of eating disorders with high accuracy.
Identifies all the significant symptoms of eating disorders comprehensively and accurately, demonstrating a deep understanding.
Does not explain any harmful effects of eating disorders or provides inaccurate information.
Explains only one harmful effect of eating disorders with limited accuracy.
Explains some harmful effects of eating disorders with some accuracy.
Explains several harmful effects of eating disorders with reasonable accuracy.
Explains most of the significant harmful effects of eating disorders with high accuracy.
Explains all the significant harmful effects of eating disorders comprehensively and accurately, demonstrating a deep understanding of the physical and psychological consequences.
Demonstrates no understanding of the complexities of eating disorders
Demonstrates a limited understanding of the complexities of eating disorders
Demonstrates some awareness of the complexities of eating disorders
Demonstrates a good understanding of the complexities of eating disorders, like societal pressures and low self-esteem.
Demonstrates a strong understanding of the complexities of eating disorders, incorporating societal pressures and low self-esteem.

Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the complexities of eating disorders, discussing various factors such as societal pressures, low self-esteem, genetic predispositions, and psychological factors.
